parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Collection of documents to analyze and tasks to execute.

202.description: A successful call results with an Operation-Location header used to check the status of the job.
A successful call results with an Operation-Location header used to check the status of the job.

get.summary: Get healthcare analysis job status and results

202.description: A successful call results with an Operation-Location header used to check the status of the job.

post.summary: Linked entities from a well known knowledge base.

analysisInput.description: The set of documents to process as part of this batch.

displayName.description: Optional display name for the analysis job.

tasks.description:
The set of tasks to execute on the input documents.
Cannot specify the same task more than once.

name.description: Long name of a detected language (e.g. English, French).

iso6391Name.description:
A two letter representation of the detected language according to the ISO 639-1 
standard (e.g. en, fr).

confidenceScore.description:
A confidence score between 0 and 1. 

Scores close to 1 indicate 100% certainty that the identified language is true.

statistics.description: If showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the document payload.
If showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the document payload.
If showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the document payload.

keyPhrases.description:
A list of representative words or phrases.

The number of key phrases returned is proportional to the number of words in the input document.

statistics.description: If showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the document payload.
If showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the document payload.

entities.description: Recognized well known entities in the document.

statistics.description: If showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the document payload.

confidenceScores.description: Document level sentiment confidence scores between 0 and 1 for each sentiment class.

charactersCount.description: Number of text elements recognized in the document.

transactionsCount.description: Number of transactions for the document.

statistics.description: If showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the request payload.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

model-version.description:
This value indicates which model will be used for scoring.
If a model-version is not specified, the API should default to the latest, non-preview version.

loggingOptOut.description:
If set to true, you opt-out of having your text input logged for troubleshooting.

By default, Text Analytics logs your input text for 48 hours, solely to allow for
troubleshooting issues in providing you with the Text Analytics natural language
processing functions. Setting this parameter to true disables input logging and
may limit our ability to remediate issues that occur. Please see Cognitive Services
Compliance and Privacy notes at https://aka.ms/cs-compliance for additional details,
and Microsoft Responsible AI principles at https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/ai/responsible-ai.

stringIndexType.description:
Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets.

Defaults to grapheme clusters according to Unicode v8.0.0.
For additional information see https://aka.ms/text-analytics-offsets

text.description: Entity text as appears in the request.

offset.description:
Start position for the entity text. 
Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the offset returned.

length.description:
Length for the entity text. 
Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the length returned.

confidenceScore.description: Confidence score between 0 and 1 of the extracted entity.

statistics.description: If showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the request payload.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

model-version.description:
This value indicates which model will be used for scoring.
If a model-version is not specified, the API should default to the latest, non-preview version.

loggingOptOut.description:
If set to true, you opt-out of having your text input logged for troubleshooting.

By default, Text Analytics logs your input text for 48 hours, solely to allow for
troubleshooting issues in providing you with the Text Analytics natural language
processing functions. Setting this parameter to true disables input logging and
may limit our ability to remediate issues that occur. Please see Cognitive Services

stringIndexType.description:
Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets.

Defaults to grapheme clusters according to Unicode v8.0.0.
For additional information see https://aka.ms/text-analytics-offsets

innererror.description: Inner error contains more specific information.

conditionality.description: Describes any conditionality on the entity.

certainty.description: Describes the entities certainty and polarity.

association.description: Describes if the entity is the subject of the text or if it describes someone else.

text.description: Entity text as appears in the request.

offset.description: Start position for the entity text. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the offset returned.

length.description: Length for the entity text. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the length returned.

confidenceScore.description: Confidence score between 0 and 1 of the extracted entity.

name.description: Preferred name for the entity. Example: 'histologically' would have a 'name' of 'histologic'.

links.description: Entity references in known data sources.

dataSource.description: Entity Catalog. Examples include: UMLS, CHV, MSH, etc.

id.description: Entity id in the given source catalog.

HealthcareRelation.description:
Every relation is an entity graph of a certain relationType, where all entities
are connected and have specific roles within the relation context.

ref.description: Reference link object, using a JSON pointer RFC 6901 (URI Fragment Identifier Representation), pointing to the entity .

role.description:
Role of entity in the relationship.    

For example: 'CD20-positive diffuse large B-cell lymphoma' has the following entities with their 
roles in parenthesis: CD20 (GeneOrProtein), Positive (Expression), diffuse large B-cell lymphoma 
(Diagnosis).

statistics.description: If showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the request payload.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

innererror.description: Inner error contains more specific information.

statistics.description: If showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the request payload.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

statistics.description: If showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the request payload.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

matches.description: List of instances this entity appears in the text.

language.description: Language used in the data source.

id.description: Unique identifier of the recognized entity from the data source.

url.description: URL for the entity's page from the data source.

dataSource.description: Data source used to extract entity linking, such as Wiki/Bing etc.

bingId.description: Bing Entity Search API unique identifier of the recognized entity.

confidenceScore.description: If a well known item is recognized, a decimal number denoting the confidence level between 0 and 1 will be returned.

text.description: Entity text as appears in the request.

offset.description: Start position for the entity match text

length.description: Length for the entity match text.

documents.description: The set of documents to process as part of this batch.

language.description:
This is the 2 letter ISO 639-1 representation of a language. 

For example, use "en" for English; "es" for Spanish etc. z,an
If not set, use "en" for English as default."

statistics.description: If showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the document payload.
If showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the request payload.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

model-version.description:
This value indicates which model will be used for scoring.
If a model-version is not specified, the API should default to the latest, non-preview version.

If set to true, you opt-out of having your text input logged for troubleshooting.

stringIndexType.description:
Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets.

Defaults to grapheme clusters according to Unicode v8.0.0.
For additional information see https://aka.ms/text-analytics-offsets

domain.description: If specified, will set the PII domain to include only a subset of the entity categories.

piiCategories.description: Describes the PII categories to return.

documentsCount.description: Number of documents submitted in the request.

validDocumentsCount.description: Number of valid documents. This excludes empty, over-size limit or non-supported languages documents.

erroneousDocumentsCount.description: Number of invalid documents. This includes empty, over-size limit or non-supported languages documents.

transactionsCount.description: Number of transactions for the request.

sentiment.description: The predicted sentiment for the sentence.

confidenceScores.description: The sentiment confidence score between 0 and 1 for the sentence for all classes.

offset.description: The sentence offset from the start of the document.

targets.description: The array of sentence targets for the sentence.

confidenceScores.description: Target sentiment confidence scores for the target in the sentence.

offset.description: The target offset from the start of the sentence.

relations.description: The array of either assessment or target objects which is related to the target.

statistics.description: If showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the request payload.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

model-version.description:
This value indicates which model will be used for scoring.
If a model-version is not specified, the API should default to the latest, non-preview version.

loggingOptOut.description:
If set to true, you opt-out of having your text input logged for troubleshooting.

stringIndexType.description:
Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets.

Defaults to grapheme clusters according to Unicode v8.0.0.
For additional information see https://aka.ms/text-analytics-offsets

opinionMining.description:
If set to true, response will contain not only sentiment prediction but also opinion 
mining (aspect-based sentiment analysis) results.

relationType.description: The type related to the target.

ref.description: The JSON pointer indicating the linked object.

targetRef.description: A JSON pointer reference indicating the target object.

JobParameters.$skip.name: $skip
JobParameters.$skip.description:
Set the number of elements to offset in the response.
When both $top and $skip are specified, $skip is applied first.

JobParameters.$top.name: $top
JobParameters.$top.description:
Set the maximum number of results per task.
When both $top and $skip are specified, $skip is applied first.

LanguageInputParameter.name: input
LanguageInputParameter.description: Collection of documents to analyze for language endpoint.

LoggingOptOutParameter.name: loggingOptOut
LoggingOptOutParameter.description:
If set to true, you opt-out of having your text input logged for troubleshooting.

By default, Text Analytics logs your input text for 48 hours, solely to allow for
troubleshooting issues in providing you with the Text Analytics natural language
processing functions. Setting this parameter to true disables input logging and
may limit our ability to remediate issues that occur. Please see Cognitive Services
Compliance and Privacy notes at https://aka.ms/cs-compliance for additional details,
and Microsoft Responsible AI principles at https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/ai/responsible-ai.

ModelVersionParameter.name: model-version
ModelVersionParameter.description:
This value indicates which model will be used for scoring.
If a model-version is not specified, the API should default to the latest, non-preview version.

PiiParameters.domain.name: domain
PiiParameters.domain.description: If specified, will set the PII domain to include only a subset of the entity categories.

PiiParameters.piiCategories.name: piiCategories
PiiParameters.piiCategories.description: Describes the PII categories to return.

SentimentParameters.opinionMining.name: opinionMining
SentimentParameters.opinionMining.description:
If set to true, response will contain not only sentiment prediction but also opinion 
mining (aspect-based sentiment analysis) results.

ShowStatsParameter.name: showStats
ShowStatsParameter.description: If set to true, response will contain request and document level statistics.
